name: Inventory Dungeon
description:
Played with keyboard only (sorry, mobile users).

This game was made over the course of the 72 hour Mini Jam 45. The topic was "Dungeons" and "Pocket Sized".

Please leave a comment telling me how far you got, what you liked and what I could have done better.

Development info:

All assets and programming done by myself over the course of the jam.

Tool used:

  • Unity as game engine
  • GIMP to create the pixel art
  • Inkscape to create the vector art for the player-character
  • Audacity for recording and editing audio
  • LMMS to synthesize the explosion sound effect
